snippet.title: White car in double hit-run outside St Paul's Cathedral
snippet.content:
A white car has hit a cyclist and a pedestrian outside St Paul's Cathedral with one man believed to be dead and another taken to hospital with serious injuries. The car, which did not have a number plate, stopped briefly before driving off.Photo: Paul Harris A witness said the car had run a red light before hitting the two men. An ambulance is at the scene and preparing to take one of the victims to hospital. A large number of police have closed at least one lane near the corner of Swanston and Flinders streets. Trams along Flinders Street are also being impacted.
R70/75 operating between the suburbs & Flinders/Russell St with no trams between Docklands & Flinders St Station due to traffic incident.
More to come
